title: Mountain - Flowers of Evil (1971) [FLAC]
description:
tracklist


    1 - "Flowers of Evil" (West/Pappalardi/Rea) - 4:52
    2 - "King's Chorale" (Pappalardi) - 1:04
    3 - "One Last Cold Kiss" (Pappalardi/Collins) - 3:54
    4 - "Crossroader" (Pappalardi/Collins) - 4:53
    5 - "Pride And Passion" (Pappalardi/Collins) - 7:11
    6 - "Dream Sequence: Guitar Solo (West)/Roll Over Beethoven (Chuck Berry)/Dreams of Milk and Honey (West/Pappalardi/Ventura/Landsberg)/Variations (West/Pappalardi/Laing/Knight)/Swan Theme (Pappalardi/Collins)" - 25:03
    7 - "Mississippi Queen" (West/Pappalardi/Laing/Rea) - 3:49


tracks 1-5 studio, tracks 6 & 7 recorded live on June 27, 1971 at the Filmore East in New York City 


lineup:


    Leslie West - guitar, vocals
    Felix Pappalardi - bass, vocals
    Corky Laing - drums, percussion
    Steve Knight - organ


cover art included
